title: SparkCluster 2.2 - Zeppelin 0.7.3 - Python 2.7 - LDAP
description: Spark 2.2 cluster with Zeppelin 0.7.3 Notebook editor
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.2 with Tensorflow and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.7.3.

title: SparkCluster 2.3 - Jupyter 5.4.0 - Python 3.6.4
description: Spark 2.3 cluster with Jupyter 5.5.0 Notebook editor for Python 3.6
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.3.1 with Python 3.6.5, Tensorflow 1.10.1 and Keras enabled together with Jupyter 5.5.0 and PixieDust 1.1.11

title: SparkCluster 2.3 - Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot) - Python 3.6 - LDAP
description: Spark 2.3 cluster with Zeppelin 0.8 compiled from sources with Python 3.6
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.3.1 with Python 3.6.6, Tensorflow 1.10.1 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.

title: Jupyter Notebook Editor
description: Standalone Jupyter 5.5.0 Notebook editor for Python 3.6
note: Deploys Jupyter Notebook editor with Python 3.6.5, Tensorflow 1.11.0 and Keras enabled.

title: Spark Cluster dedicated for SELT
description: Spark 2.3 cluster with Zeppelin 0.8 compiled from sources with Python 3.6
note: Deploys a Spark cluster running Spark 2.3.1 with Python 3.6.6, Tensorflow 1.13.1 and Keras enabled together with Zeppelin 0.8 (snapshot) configured with Nokia CSL authentication.
